languages.text: Считается, что они записаны со слов самого Императора. У каждого мира могут быть свои местные законы, но Лекс Империалис главенствует над всеми ними.

traits.locale_text: Свод законов Империума, принятых за последние десять тысяч лет и скурпулезно собранных в Книгу правосудия судьями Адептус Арбайтес. Считается, что они записаны со слов самого Императора. У каждого мира могут быть свои местные законы, но Лекс Империалис главенствует над всеми ними. Судьи Адептус Арбайтес безжалостно следят за соблюдением Лекс Империалис во всем Империуме.

languages.text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.
languages.original_text: Считается, что они записаны со слов самого Императора. У каждого мира могут быть свои местные законы, но Лекс Империалис главенствует над всеми ними.

traits.locale_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.
It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.
It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

languages.text: Es heißt, es handle sich um niedergeschriebene Worte des Imperators selbst. Jede Welt hat zwar eigene lokale Gesetze, aber sie unterstehen alle dem Lex Imperia.
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

traits.locale_text: Es heißt, es handle sich um niedergeschriebene Worte des Imperators selbst. Jede Welt hat zwar eigene lokale Gesetze, aber sie unterstehen alle dem Lex Imperia.

languages.text: Ces édits législatifs auraient été rédigés sous la dictée de l'Empereur en personne, et malgré les lois propres à chaque monde, la Lex Imperialis prévaut en toute circonstance.
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

traits.locale_text: Ces édits législatifs auraient été rédigés sous la dictée de l'Empereur en personne, et malgré les lois propres à chaque monde, le Lex Imperialis prévaut en toute circonstance.

languages.text: 所有帝国人民都相信帝国法典源自帝皇本人的话语。尽管每个世界都有各自的地方法规，但帝国法典的权威高于一切。
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

traits.locale_text: 所有帝国人民都相信帝国法典源自帝皇本人的话语。尽管每个世界都有各自的地方法规，但帝国法典的权威高于一切。

languages.text: 皇帝自身の言葉から書き記されたと信じられている。各世界には独自の法律が存在するが、レックス・インペリアはそれら全てに優先する。
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝自身の言葉から書き記されたと信じられている。各世界には独自の法律が存在するが、レックス・インペリアはそれら全てに優先する。

languages.text: Se cree que las dictó el mismísimo Emperador. Aunque cada mundo puede tener sus propias leyes, la Lex Imperialis tiene precedencia sobre todas ellas.
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.

traits.locale_text: Se cree que las dictó el mismísimo Emperador. Aunque cada mundo puede tener sus propias leyes, la Lex Imperialis tiene precedencia sobre todas ellas.

languages.text: Bu kanunların İmparator Hazretleri'nin ağzından çıkan sözlerin yazıya geçirilmiş hâli olduğuna inanılmaktadır. Her dünyanın kendi yerel yasaları olsa da Lex İmperialis hepsinden üstünde gelir.
languages.original_text: It is believed that they were written down from the words of the Emperor Himself. Each world may have its own local laws, but the Lex Imperialis takes precedence over them all.
